name: Cauldron of Clarity
desc: Countless threads of Sword Will pulse like heartbeats, echoing through this tiny stretch of sky. Just don't get too close and don't try to make sense of the world inside the cauldron with your own ears. Those echoes have already been twisted into the brain-melting chant of "Ehn-ne ehn-ne."
desc2: Equip to increase Rupture Agents' combat capabilities
